website_summaries.verdict: This is a highly unique STEM toy. You can do some odd, creative things with it, but you'll need a little computer expertise.
pros: Incorporates audio and visuals with creativity
Homemade inventions are gratifying and stimulate the intellect
cons: Some adult help may be required

website_summaries.verdict: Ready to use out of the box, this circuit-based unit is small and pricey for the features it offers.
pros: A fun way to learn to assign behaviors to specific objects, such as bananas and apples
Kids have fun coming up with new applications for the kit, such as piano keys, dance mats and game pads
cons: Not enough alligator clips and wire leads for some applications, but more can be hooked up
Connector cable is not very long
Pricey for its size and components

customer_reviews.title: Recommend the Evil Genius project book for exciting things to ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves all the things he can do with his makey makey. Recommend the Evil Genius project book for exciting things to create.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: TOP PICK for STEM Projects
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product. So easy and so much fun for the kids while they learn about technology. A top pick for STEM products. Can be accessed using SCRATCH programming. And can be expanded by adding Arduino piggy back board to make limitless projects. STEM Project shown features Makey Makey GO integrated to Art.... This is STEAM project. Mayor Tecklenberg of Charleston SC shown with young inventor.
customer_reviews.author: Keisler

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the kids busy and happy.
customer_reviews.text: This has been the hit of the spring with the kids. We've had musical bananas, a sandwich space bar, water balloon instruments and a few other crazy shenanigans. How this will become an instrument for the talent show this year is yet to be determined, but I see it coming - and can't wait. This is exactly the hands-on, creative and critical thinking kids need.
customer_reviews.author: busymama

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.text: While my 13-yo son didn't continue to play with this over the next year, he certainly enjoyed it for a few months. I loved that it contained everything he needed for creative, educational "wow" factor right on Christmas morning. So, great Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.author: julia bowling

customer_reviews.title: Fun, for a little
customer_reviews.text: So much fun!!! When we bought this me and my sister couldn’t put it down! We used it to play many games and played wonderful piano music with it 😂. Unfortunately after the first time we used it, it never saw the light of day again. It’s not the company’s fault, it is just that there was no motivation for us to keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: D. R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Father's Day gift he shared with the kiddos
customer_reviews.text: This was hours of fun for both my husband and 5 year old daughter, I am sure they will go back to it a lot as there are many options to increase the difficulty level based on your child's interests and abilities. I am not sure who liked it more, my husband or my daughter ;)
customer_reviews.author: Avid Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: did my kids have a great time with this
customer_reviews.text: Holy moly, did my kids have a great time with this. They spent an entire night getting along wonderfully playing with it. They haven't gone back to it since, but I think they will eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Not a fan

customer_reviews.title: Makey Makey's do not work
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 5 of these for our elementary school and the cords that go from the board to the computer do not fit. When I tried using a regular Makey Makey cord then the board did not work. Spoke to people at Makey Makey and they said these were fake. Now we are stuck with 5 boards that do not work. Updated Review: Found out that these were fake makey boards. A person from Joy Labz contacted me and totally replaced fake boards. They were wonderful to rectify this problem. In the future I would only buy these from the Makey Makey site. Thanks Makey Makey!!
customer_reviews.author: LS school

customer_reviews.title: Great tech toy, but accessories are very cheap quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item to build DIY projects. Very small and compact, easy to set up and use, and clear to understand if you're familiar with electronics and circuitry. The major problem that I have is for the price point, I would expect at the very least to get some quality alligator clips to connect to the conductors. The springs in the clips don't put enough tension to even close, and they definitely don't hold on to what they're clipped to. I definitely expected more durable connectors, and will have to shop for more elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Dustyn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and fun to see endless creativity
customer_reviews.text: Makey Makey kit was what my kids needed to bridge the gap between computer programming and HMI. I have tried using other more advanced products like arduino, but the complexity scared my kids away. Makey drove simplicity and an easy to understand approach that was easily adaptable to almost anything the kids dreamed of. I was afraid the kit would not offer enough to keep them entertained for long. However with the adaptability of the product we quickly found ways to keep this going for hours. My boys continue to enjoy this and ask to bring it out occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: Max L

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: I teach high school and use this as a teaching tool. I had no issues connecting it to my PC and Raspberry Pi 3b+. The students get a kick out of controlling video games with all sorts of objects. I would like to see a DIY kit in the future with a lower price point as this is essentially plug-and-play device that requires no skill to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Fake Product
customer_reviews.text: Makey Makey is a great product for kids, the reason for a low review is because we purchased this as a lightning deal and realized we got a fake product :( It had the wrong USB cable (wouldn't fit in the device) and the alligator clips are the wrong colors. I'm not sure if the board is also fake. It is outside of the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I have seen this little gizmo at maker faires, at my son's school and so on and saw how it sparked interest in my son. It is so easy to plug into a computer and start making key presses. There are a ton of websites where this can be used as an input, and it's fun to watch kids use different items for input or test to see if they are conductive. So many possibilities for learning!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: My 11 year old son is very happy to have the Makey Makey
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old son is very happy to have the Makey Makey. He played with it at school and requested it. They had one in Amazon Warehouse that came to my house practically new. My son enjoys playing online games with his made up controllers> I'll update this review once he gets to play with it more.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Names

customer_reviews.title: Endless Possibilities!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the creative abilities this Makey Makey can offer. Endless possibilities for extending g learning. My 5th graders connected homemade robots to their projects created in Scratch. One broke where the USB needed to be attached with less than 2 weeks use. A similar product available for 1/2 the price.
customer_reviews.author: Beep

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: My son asked for this for Christmas. He has played with it since receiving it. I don't really understand what it is, but he says you can turn anything into game controls. To prove it, he has taken just about one of everything we own into his bedroom to try it out. Maybe it does more, not sure. He plays with it for hours though.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a kit for my classroom. Alligator clips stared breaking second time my students used it. Was thinking about purchasing more but will not...it's not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Manago

customer_reviews.title: ... stuff you can do with this my son got bored fast.
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt come with much instructions of stuff you can do with this my son got bored fast.. Banana piano is only fun for so long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this he try’s turning everything into a controller great buy shipped fast no issues came with everything you need
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy for kids and non-techies
customer_reviews.text: You can really have some fun with this with kids as young as maybe 5 (attended). There are plenty of sites online that can also be used with it; for example, hook up the Makey Makey board to bananas and plug top your computer to play music.
customer_reviews.author: FamilyGuy

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't quite sure what to expect, however my 11 yr old/ Techie Son had the biggest thrill with this kit.. and so did Mom! Lol Did not expect to hear real music coming from the attachments of random household items, such as fruit!! Will definitely purchase more :-) PS... this Xmas gift got almost as much attention as his new X Box!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: My 13 year old son loves it.. But ...
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old son loves it.. But it is one of those novelty things that kids that age go board with after a week or so.. Not products fault!
customer_reviews.author: Mashtali

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, only limited by your imagination!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my 12 year old daughter. Easy to use and lots of fun, but the novelty wore off fairly quickly. Still glad I purchased it though, very cool kit!!
customer_reviews.author: momof3

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, tons of fun, endless possibilities
customer_reviews.text: Got one for my class to play around with. Very easy to setup, no issues with the USB connection. So far, they have used it with Scratch and have had all kinds of fun setting up little "games." They've used it to code pencil drawings, aluminum foil, vegetables, and even other students. They have had so much fun with it in just a few weeks. I will be adding a couple more of these to the classroom!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gadget!!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the absolute best gadgets that I have added to my classroom. You will lose yourself with all the possibilities. I can’t wait to raise the funds to buy a class set
customer_reviews.author: KHY

customer_reviews.title: Creative possibilities are endless!
customer_reviews.text: I bought several of these for use in my classroom. They are a big hit and the students can't get enough of them. The possibilities for what they can create are endless! However, the reason I only gave it 4 stars is because out of the box several of the alligator clips were broken. That was a major disappointment, but they are adjusting. Better quality clips would be wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: DLM

customer_reviews.title: Great smart fun
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves this, he was playing piano with bananas, adorable fun. It is expensive in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Cantabela

customer_reviews.title: Funny name, but a great toy for learning
customer_reviews.text: I had never heard of this before, but my 9 yr. old grandson wanted it for Christmas. Two family members got it for him and he was beyond thrilled. This is great for the future engineer.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn J. Pete

customer_reviews.title: Love our Makey Makey
customer_reviews.text: Love our Makey Makey! Definitely purchase the hard case for protection and the book 20 Makey Make Projects for the Evil Genius to guide you along!
customer_reviews.author: Boymom412

customer_reviews.title: Bad packaging.
customer_reviews.text: I’m very unsatisfied with this. The corner of the board was broken upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Makey Make This
customer_reviews.text: This kit was purchased for my son and my daughter! Both are 10 and spend many hours creating with it. I love that it's semi electric and my daughter has just as much of an interest in it as my son. It's easy to use and the instructions are clear and concise!
customer_reviews.author: Monica M Palla

customer_reviews.title: Clever and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Such a clever and fun way to help teach computer, engineering, coding skills to kids and instill confidence in them. You will want to get a graphite pencil for other ways to explore and use the makey makey board.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Conn

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly engaging and amusing!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson age 8 LOVED it, he was beyond stoked! He is an avid gamer and found this to be a pure delight, shared with everyone in the family, got him out of his game into the family fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Crabtree

customer_reviews.title: Endless Combinations.
customer_reviews.text: This is fun to play with, the first thing we did was using potatoes as drums and then they hooked them to each other and played a song. There really are so many different things you can do with this kit. Keeps the imagination going. Really fun and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: This was a great purchase for my 10 yr old daughter
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase for my 10 yr old daughter. She is really into computers and programing. A+++ product
customer_reviews.author: Jmiller

customer_reviews.title: Super fun
customer_reviews.text: My kids have been having a blast with this. They made a little keyboard with marshmallows and something with pencil on a paper. Even used it to control a computer game.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S

customer_reviews.title: Beginner level computer interaction, fun for anyone.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased three of these now and am looking for opportunities to get more. Nothing makes learning more fun than interaction. The Makey Makey is a great first step into the world of computer interaction. I first purchased it for a 3rd grader and had to quickly buy another because the 5&6th graders were always using it. It is simple to begin and fun to keep using.
customer_reviews.author: BT

customer_reviews.title: Great intro to concepts of electricity and programming
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old son loves this. Good lessons about what conducts electricity and what doesn’t
customer_reviews.author: nkmon

customer_reviews.title: and my 7 year old usually tags along for the fun. It even blew the mind of my 18 ...
customer_reviews.text: If this wasn't, it certainly should have been on the top gift list. It makes the user think outside of the box and has endless possibilities. My 15 year old son uses this often, and my 7 year old usually tags along for the fun. It even blew the mind of my 18 year old nephew. So much to do with this toy. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for grandson he has had many hours of fun
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Good learning toy for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is a good toy for learning about electronics and very basic control systems. You can also write your own code for go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: OK - may be a better gift for tweens
customer_reviews.text: I saw that this was a top rated game and my teen son is very into robotics; however, once you use it once...it really isn't that fun to play with. It may be better for younger kids.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: This is a great way to teach young kids how to use there ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to teach young kids how to use there mind for something creative. Teaches kids how use there mechanical skills. Everyone needs to get one of these, I'm 56 and liked doing the projects myself. I think this is more important to have than a ipad
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Makey Makey Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: Makey Makey makes learning fun! Turn a banana into a piano, apples into bongos and so much more! Easy to use and students love it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Foxx

customer_reviews.title: Such a cool way for kids to learn about electricity and coding ...
customer_reviews.text: Such a cool way for kids to learn about electricity and coding all in one! My kids learned neat concepts and some went home and bought them to use at home.
customer_reviews.author: Kaity

customer_reviews.title: fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy, our family had it out of the box and playing bongos on bananas in less than 5 minutes. Then my kids took off with it ages 8-10 and had a blast.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Design to inspire creativity
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for 13 year old son he used the first couple times and now it just sits on his desk. This may be Advanced for younger children
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L. Lavery

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My students love using these! When is tgere ever a tine you can make oranges into drums, or celery into a piano?!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea DelValle

customer_reviews.title: they really liked it and had a blast hooking it up to ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas present for our kids, my son had a science fair and they were using one of these, they really liked it and had a blast hooking it up to bananas and paper to make a working keyboard from the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha H.

customer_reviews.title: An open-ended toy
customer_reviews.text: My son played it for many years and tried just about everything he could to make it into a keyboard and musical instrument. Now that he's older, his siblings enjoy it as well. It's a great toy for exploration & experimentation.
customer_reviews.author: JESS S P

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Very Satisfied! The makey makey is so easy to use and it takes not setups or installations whatsoever! It is a great fun tool for anybody of any age. Very pleased and I recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: SO FUN!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun item! I use this at school with students! They are always intrigued and impressed. They learn a lot too!

customer_reviews.text: This toy has been pretty popular at an afterschool programming and hardware club I advise. Pretty scalable in terms of complexity if it's applied correctly.

customer_reviews.title: This is going to make an excellent science fair project in our future
customer_reviews.text: My 11 yr old likes it a lot. But, three months later...he has lost interest. I hope that after I buy him his own laptop, he will regain interest. This is going to make an excellent science fair project in our future!

customer_reviews.title: great for kids
customer_reviews.text: This kit is very fun and creative. I've never seen anything like it. It's so easy to use that kids could easily use it pretty independently. The only drawback for me is the price.

customer_reviews.title: Easy alternative to an arduino
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool for a project I was working on. I made a piano puzzle using a real upright piano and the Makey-Makey with alligator clips. Quick assembly and excellent performance. Just make sure you understand which button you are attaching to or you might accidentally code the mouse as a keypad press. This was great!
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: My 12-year-old son has been asking for this for over a year. He was delighted with it. He's been having fun figuring out what he can do with it.

customer_reviews.text: So much fun! the possibilities with this little thing are amazing. My son and his friends use it to "invent" games and have used it in projects.

customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8-year-olds. The "turn objects/water into a piano" aspect is amazingly awesome and super cool! But now we're a bit stuck figuring out what to do NEXT with it. (I admit that may say more about me than the product!!)

customer_reviews.title: Holy cow this think is great. Bought it to run "buzzers" for a family ...

I did get her an extra set of alligator clip leads to go with it tho, like some previous reviewers suggested.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, Excellent concept!
customer_reviews.text: It's really simple idea, but very well executed. If you are a rookie in electronics its amazing kit, if you are kind of advanced in electronics you may find this a little high valued but is still reasonable. The quality of the board is excellent, and what I liked the must is that is open source so if you have kind of advanced electronics/programming skills you will find that this is more than just a fancy key maker.
customer_reviews.author: GUSTAVO GARCIA

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun watching my kids come up with different methods to ...
customer_reviews.text: We now have two of these. Lots of fun watching my kids come up with different methods to use this!
customer_reviews.author: smdreview

product_meta.title: Makey Makey an Invention Kit for Everyone from JoyLabz - Hands-on Technology Learning Fun for Kids - STEM Toy - 1000s of Educational Engineering and Computer Coding Activities - Ages 8 and Up
product_meta.description: JoyLabz Makey Makey An invention kit for everyone! JoyLabz Makey Makey is a fun-for-all educational STEM kit that brings engineering and coding concepts to life in exciting new ways. Turn bananas into touchpads! Craft your own video game controller! If you can imagine it, you can make it! The possibilities for experiments and creations are limitless. With no software required or programming knowledge needed, the easy-to-setup kit is ready in seconds and lets you dive right into scientific fun that will inspire creative and inventive minds. Designed by fun-loving creatives at MIT, Makey Makey is the perfect science gift for ages 8 and up! Whether your kid is a budding engineer, computer wiz, or amateur inventor, JoyLabz invention kit will bring out their creativity in a truly unique experience! Makey Makey Invention Kit Contents: Makey Makey BoardUSB Cable7 Alligator Clips6 Connector WiresInstructions with Visual Project Start GuideOnline Documentation20 Color StickersWorks with Mac, Windows, and ChromebookAges 8 and UpMakey Makey online community allows educators and children to connect and share their creations for you and your kids to recreate at home! About JoyLabzWe believe that everyone is creative, inventive, and imaginative. We believe that everyone can create the future and change the world. So we have dedicated our lives to making easy-to-use invention kits.
feature_bullets: STEM FUN FOR ALL: No matter if your child is a budding engineer, computer wiz, or amateur inventor, JoyLabz invention kit will bring out their creativity in unique and fun ways. With thousands of possibilities to build, interact, and inspire, Makey Makey is the perfect science gift for ages 8 and up!

EASY SETUP: Just plug, clip, and play! No programming knowledge needed or cumbersome software installation. With set up in seconds, your kid can dive right into inventing, whether at home or in the classroom. No software to install. Works with Mac, Windows, and Chromebook.

CONNECT TO THE WORLD: Turn bananas into touchpads! Craft your own video game controller! Make musical circuits with items around the house! Makey Makey extends beyond the screen and brings engineering and coding concepts to life in exciting new ways.
1000s OF POSSIBILITIES: A guaranteed boredom buster. If you can imagine it, you can make it! Unlike other electronic toys, the possibilities for experiments and creations are limitless.

ABOUT JOYLABZ: We believe that everyone is creative, inventive, and imaginative. We believe that everyone can create the future and change the world. So we have dedicated our lives to making easy-to-use invention kits.
